ModMetaData.name: Beetle People (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Filthy Peasant
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of Filthy Peasants mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1504654099
- Faction is no longer permanent enemy of the Empire
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/BeetlePeople][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/6KqTKks.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] Adds Beetle people into the game. I made this mod to add variety without cluttering up crafting or item menus. It does not add anything except for the race itself and a faction.
Beetle people are: + Resilient to extreme disease and toxic environments + fast - slower farmers - unable to wear headgear and can only wear certain items
Requires Alien Race Framework 2.0
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
